data.title: Talíře nad Velkým Malíkovem (Flying Saucers Over Our Village / Flying Saucers Over Velký Malikov). 1977. Directed by Jaromil Jireš, 89 minutes. Prague, Czech Republic: Filmové Studio Barrandov.
